name: Gharros (Scorpion Demon)
resistance: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Improved Critical
traits.desc: The demon’s attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The demon’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells requiring no material components: * At will: darkness, detect evil and good, detect magic, mirror image * 3/day each: hallow, telekinesis, teleport

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The demon’s weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.desc: When the demon reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the demon can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a halberd attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The demon makes three attacks: one halberd attack and two sting attacks.

actions.name: Halberd
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Summon (1/day)
actions.desc: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning. A gharros has a 50% chance of summoning 1d6 vrocks, 1d4 hezrous, 1d3 glabrezus, 1d2 nalfeshnees, or one marilith. A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can’t summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.
